attributes.action: bring back the death penalty in the UK for murder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more cases are being brought to light whereby cold blooded killers are getting off way too lightly for taking the most precious thing someone can have - their life!  In some cases, all the for sake of a credit card or mobile phone.....something needs to be done to deter these evil killers and make them realise, life really does mean life!

rejection.details:
There is a very similar petition here:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/hangman/
If you still wish your petition to be launched, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
